Reviews.Title: “Good location, Nice apartments, but terrible reception staff”
Reviews.Author: pakistanitraveller
Reviews.Content: easy book location downside reception staffvery aloof waiting 2 hours protests fell dead inside people manager disappeared looking free internet forget itits slowest seen dubai

Reviews.Title: “Value for Money!!!”
Reviews.Author: vshrishrimal
Reviews.Content: stayed five days december 2011 location connected means metro bus taxi centrally located amenities nearby banks grocery necessities sized courteous staff nice food available nearby hotel value money hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great appartment hotel”
Reviews.Author: bramhabull
Reviews.Content: simply located loved location service main food breakfast dinner indian restaraunts closeby easy walkable distance bars nearby home visit dubai dont forget stay

Reviews.Title: “Never again”
Reviews.Author: pel579
Reviews.Content: 2 bed appartment included laundry water leaking laundry notified reception 20 mins waiting contacted 20 mins maintenance arrived looked scratched head tried taps mat outside laundry door soak leaking water solution day mat soaking wet found bathroom disgusting toilet paper towels soap look reused

Reviews.Title: “Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: bmstrip
Reviews.Content: traveled dubai umpteen times family holiday dubai time 2011 read reviews rated hotel below average beg booked apartment 1 bedroom 5 days internet online included complimentary breakfast airport pickup drop greeted chauffeur airport time dropped hotel surprise upgraded 2 bedroom apartment huge clean air condition strong switch time nights absolutely opposite heard food choices day family enjoyed stay thoroughly

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Experience - Avoid at all costs”
Reviews.Author: J S
Reviews.Content: worst experiences staying hotel apartment dubai ahve faced following 1 couches stained dirty dirty bring sit pictures prove 2 night noticed towels frontdesk send shower night hour called towels called towels laundry waiting receive clean ones ultimately bed called morning send towels frontoffice guy okay slam phone saying yes towels 10 minutes 3 bathroom floor bugs yup itty bitty dead insects died trauma little dirty bathroom 4 hotel promises equipped kitchen washing machine guess kitchen equipped kitchen table drain kitchen solved mystery insects 5 probably washing machine mine reason operated 2 morning rumbling kept awake night 6 corridor stank 7 impossible cellphone signal unless half hanging window fault telecom service provider signal uae operators du fairness hotel probably help unless option sleeping street try avoid hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money...”
Reviews.Author: bigidea089
Reviews.Content: am days 2 days 7 days business project hired avoid travel traffic likes rates hotel dislikes night internet slow cant net location taxis easily available requested receptionist call taxi cooperative nearest metro station 20 minutes hotel lifts lobby walk lift

Reviews.Title: “London Crown 1 at Dubai has gone to seed!”
Reviews.Author: krishg40
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 ago gone seed returned 19th nov 2010 5 day stay smelly coat paint badly furnished apartment request key items chase hotel staff items supplied stained chipped paint peeling oven toaster kettle etc etc hotel running due eid service tardy overall attitude whats running wouldnt stay location killer properties service reel golden sands savoy park suites crest newly citymax hotels

Reviews.Title: “GOOD HOTEL APARTMENT”
Reviews.Author: punmad
Reviews.Content: spacious hotel apartment mixed style 1 bed 2 bed 3 bedroom stayed 1 bedroom spacious amenities furnished hotel apartment nice swimming pool nice coffee shop fitness center close bank street lot restaurants vicinity stay family feel home spacious amenities
